questions.text: To combine resistors in series, you must...

answerChoices.text: add the reciprocals of the resistances.
add the resistances, and take the reciprocal of the result.
add the reciprocals of the resistances, and take the reciprocal of the result.
Resistors in series cannot be combined.

questions.text: To combine resistors in parallel, you must...

answerChoices.text: add the reciprocals of the resistances.
add the resistances, and take the reciprocal of the result.
add the reciprocals of the resistances, and take the reciprocal of the result.
Resistors in parallel cannot be combined.
Resistors in parallel cannot be combined
